name: Volatile Substance
description: Volatile Substance is a precursor resource used in making explosiveAmmunitionand weapons like theFrag Grenade. Volatile Substance is highly unstable and has a spoil timer of 600 seconds. Once spoiled, the item will then becomeInert Volatile Substance.
